title: Ultimate Slow-Cooker Chili
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add beef and cook until browned all over, about 4 minutes. (It doesn’t need to cook all the way through!) Drain fat, then stir in tomato paste.
In a large slow cooker, combine beef, onion, kidney beans, crushed tomatoes, beer, garlic, chili powder, cumin, oregano, paprika, and cayenne. Season with salt and pepper.
Cook on low for 6 and up to 8 hours. (The longer it's in the slow-cooker, the more flavor it gets.)
Taste for seasonings. Serve warm with cheese, Fritos, and green onions, if using.
ingredients: 2 (15-oz.) cans kidney beans, drained and rinsed
Thinly sliced green onions, for serving (optional)
